name: CyberMonk 20XX
description:
In line with this year's theme, CyberMonk 20XX is a side scrolling brawler without direct attacks. Instead of your usual punches and kicks, your goal is to pray to the gods for assistance. If you pray hard enough the gods will unleash their wrath!

A = LEFT

D = RIGHT

J = ROLL

K = PRAY [HOLD]

L  = PUSH

R  = RESET GAME
